General.Name: Tyner Resources Ltd
General.Description: Tyner Resources Ltd. does not have significant operations. The company intends to identify, evaluate, and acquire an interest in a business or assets. Tyner Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
